attributes.action: Provide New Trains & Carriages For The North Of Englands Rail Network!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As voters of the north of england, we urge the Government to act promptly to increase the size of the trains in the north of england covering all operators north of watford and to provide newer trains so that we the passengers receive the same level of comfort for travel as voters in london and the south of england receive.
